title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.8 - Selection criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.8 - Selection criteria

State Regulations
(a) Only
eligible projects may qualify for assistance hereunder. In selecting recipients
for assistance hereunder from among competing eligible projects, the
corporation shall give consideration to the rank assigned to the relative
applications by the department. (b) In addition, the corporation shall take the following factors into
consideration: (1)
the ability of the
applicant to undertake the proposed project as evidenced by its past history
and accomplishments and its current activities; (2)
the commitment of the applicant to the
development of child day care centers, especially those serving the needs of
low-income families; (3)
the need
for a child day care center in the location for the proposed project; and
(4)
the degree to which the
proposed project evidences the potential for the successful operation of a
child day care center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4227.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
